ideas.title: Tic Tac Toe
ideas.description: A simple tic tac toe game in which two players seek in alternate turns to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O's or three X's drawn in the spaces of a grid of nine squares

ideas.title: Code Snippets
ideas.description: A collection of code snippets which allows you to copy paste your code snippet and lets you to download it as an image to share!

ideas.title: Weather App
ideas.description: A weather play which shows the current weather and the forecast for the next 5 days

ideas.title: Calculator
ideas.description: A simple calculator which can perform basic arithmetic operations

ideas.title: To Do List
ideas.description: A simple to do list play which allows you to add, delete and edit your to do list

ideas.title: Note Taker
ideas.description: A simple note taker play which allows you to add, delete and edit your notes

ideas.title: Calendar
ideas.description: A simple calendar play which allows you to add, delete and edit your events

ideas.title: Threads
ideas.description: Build a react application for creating threads like in Twitter with a model, allowing multiple threads, tweet size constraints, and display them on the home page.

ideas.title: Animations
ideas.description: Build a react application for creating animations like in Twitter with a model, allowing multiple animations, animation size constraints, and display them on the home page.

ideas.title: React Editor
ideas.description: Build an Editor for users to type texts and do formatting like bold, italic, underline, alignments, and strikethrough.

ideas.title: Chatter
ideas.description: Build a chat application for users to chat with each other. This project doesn't use any bots.

ideas.title: GitHub User Search
ideas.description: Build a react application for searching GitHub users.

ideas.title: T-Rex Chrome dino game
ideas.description: T-Rex Dinosaur - a replica of the hidden game from Chrome offline mode. Build the same using React.

ideas.title: GitHub Issue Pages
ideas.description: Build a React application to clone the GitHub issue page for a repository.

ideas.title: Quiz App
ideas.description: Build a React application for a quiz play. The quiz should have multiple questions and multiple answers.

ideas.title: 2048 Game
ideas.description: 2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle video game. Build the same using React.

ideas.title: QA Site
ideas.description: Build a Question/Answer site like StackOverflow, using React.

ideas.title: Language translator
ideas.description: Build a React application for translating text from one language to another. Please use an existing API.

ideas.title: Infinite News Feed
ideas.description: Build a play for infinite scrolling news feed.

ideas.title: Expense Tracker
ideas.description: Build a play for tracking expenses. Add, remove, edit expenses, categorize them

ideas.title: Animations Portfolio
ideas.description: Build a Portfolio made with react by framer-motion. Projects, Portfolio Section, Skills & Experience, Companies you work in with carousel, and Contacts.

ideas.title: Personal Profile Card
ideas.description: A Personal Profile Card have name, description, cover, profile photo and social links

ideas.title: Image Gallery
ideas.description: Build a responsive image gallery with search functionality by using Unsplash free API.

ideas.title: Color Guess Game
ideas.description: Build a Color Guess Game that you can give the user a color and he will choose from 6 squares + there are two levels Hard and Easy, Easy has 3 squares and hard has 6 squares.
